name: Tomasz Lee
profile_summary: Results-driven Field Service Engineer with a strong background in troubleshooting and repairs, leveraging technical expertise in biomedical and electrical engineering to deliver exceptional service. Possesses 9+ years of experience in automation and network configuration, ensuring seamless operations for PC and server environments. Highly skilled in preventative maintenance, calibration, and managing service contracts to maximize customer satisfaction. Demonstrated ability to diagnose and resolve complex technical issues, facilitating effective communication and support across teams. Committed to excellence in service and building lasting client relationships.
